mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, b. * from (select board_no as boardNo, (SELECT FILEPATH FROM file_tbl WHERE file_no=(SELECT MIN(file_NO) FROM file_tbl where board_no=b.board_no)) AS thumbnail, board_name as boardName, board_writer as boardWriter, board_date as boardDate, board_count as boardCount from board_tbl b order by 1 desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select (SELECT FILEPATH FROM file_tbl WHERE file_no=(SELECT MIN(file_NO) FROM file_tbl where board_no=b.board_no)) AS thumbnail, board_name as boardName, board_writer as boardWriter, to_char(board_date,'"20"YY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as boardDate, board_count as boardCount, board_no as boardNo from board_tbl b left join member_tbl m on b.board_writer = m.member_id where m.member_id = #{_parameter}

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, member_gender as memberGender, to_char(member_bday,'""YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as memberBday, member_account as memberAccount, member_path as memberPath, member_agree as memberAgree, member_status as memberStatus, member_bank as memberBank, reg_date as regDate, member_zonecode as memberZoneCode from member_tbl where member_id = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert:

select max(join_no) from board_join

insert into board_order values( board_order_seq.nextval, #{optionNo}, #{orderCount}, #{joinNo} )
select max(join_no) from board_join

insert into board_tbl values( board_seq.nextval, #{boardWriter}, #{boardName}, #{boardContent}, to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{accountWriter}, #{accountName}, #{accountBank}, to_date(#{boardStart},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{boardEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{referenceLink}, to_date(#{deliveryDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{boardEtc}, 1, 0, #{detailCategoryNo}, 0 )
select max(board_no) from board_tbl
mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, board_writer as boardWriter, board_name as boardName, d_category_no as detailCategoryNo, board_content as boardContent, to_char(board_date,'"20"YY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as boardDate, account_writer as accountWriter, account_name as accountName, account_bank as accountBank, board_start as boardStart, board_end as boardEnd, reference_link as referenceLink, delivery_date as deliveryDate, board_etc as boardEtc, board_status as boardStatus, board_count as boardCount, report_count as reportCount from board_tbl where board_no = #{_parameter}

select b.board_no as boardNo, (SELECT FILEPATH FROM file_tbl WHERE file_no=(SELECT MIN(file_NO) FROM file_tbl where board_no=b.board_no)) AS thumbnail, b.board_name as boardName, b.board_status as boardStatus, join_no as joinNo, to_char(payer_date,'""YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as payerDate, deposit_price as depositPrice, account_name as accountName, receiver_name as receiverName, receiver_phone as receiverPhone, receiver_phone as receiverAddr, account_bank as accountBank from board_tbl b left join board_join bj on b.board_no = bj.board_no where member_no = #{_parameter}

select b.board_no as boardNo, (SELECT FILEPATH FROM file_tbl WHERE file_no=(SELECT MIN(file_NO) FROM file_tbl where board_no=b.board_no)) AS thumbnail, b.board_name as boardName, b.board_status as boardStatus, join_no as joinNo, to_char(payer_date,'""YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as payerDate, deposit_price as depositPrice, account_name as accountName, receiver_name as receiverName, receiver_phone as receiverPhone, account_bank as accountBank, account_writer as accountWriter, refund_bank as refundBank, refund_account as refundAccount, refund_name as refundName, order_count as orderCount, payer_name as payerName from board_tbl b left join board_join bj on b.board_no = bj.board_no where join_no = #{_parameter}
select option_no as optionNo, board_no as boardNo, detail_name as detailName, detail_price as detailPrice, detail_count as detailCount from board_option where board_no = #{_parameter}
select file_no as fileNo, board_no as boardNo, filepath from file_tbl where board_no = #{_parameter}
